UniprotID	Q86X24
Accession	Q86X24;A6NMK2;B3KUK1;Q4G114;Q5T5I3;Q5T5I4;Q5T5I5;Q6FIC1;Q9H0K8
EntryName	HORM1_HUMAN
ProteinName	HORMA domain-containing protein 1 (Cancer/testis antigen 46) (CT46) (Newborn ovary HORMA protein)
GeneName	HORMAD1 NOHMA
Length	394
Function	Plays a key role in meiotic progression. Regulates 3 different functions during meiosis: ensures that sufficient numbers of processed DNA double-strand breaks (DSBs) are available for successful homology search by increasing the steady-state numbers of single-stranded DSB ends. Promotes synaptonemal-complex formation independently of its role in homology search. Plays a key role in the male mid-pachytene checkpoint and the female meiotic prophase checkpoint: required for efficient build-up of ATR activity on unsynapsed chromosome regions, a process believed to form the basis of meiotic silencing of unsynapsed chromatin (MSUC) and meiotic prophase quality control in both sexes.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Chromosome
Disorder	0.3019,0.3286,0.3019,0.2094,0.1611,0.0835,0.1275,0.1611,0.1823,0.1275,0.1449,0.1823,0.2328,0.2224,0.2680,0.2609,0.2680,0.2002,0.1323,0.0870,0.0734,0.0985,0.0605,0.0443,0.0592,0.0592,0.1162,0.0676,0.0618,0.0313,0.0320,0.0334,0.0198,0.0123,0.0130,0.0127,0.0092,0.0083,0.0117,0.0191,0.0153,0.0134,0.0090,0.0123,0.0191,0.0240,0.0209,0.0138,0.0205,0.0223,0.0253,0.0235,0.0163,0.0263,0.0248,0.0153,0.0163,0.0287,0.0618,0.0518,0.0506,0.0506,0.0734,0.1229,0.1229,0.1229,0.1229,0.1251,0.1373,0.1298,0.0631,0.0817,0.0909,0.1298,0.0704,0.0704,0.1229,0.0948,0.0506,0.0494,0.0483,0.0443,0.0483,0.0248,0.0263,0.0214,0.0151,0.0108,0.0109,0.0130,0.0099,0.0108,0.0134,0.0223,0.0263,0.0555,0.1070,0.1137,0.1449,0.2193,0.1373,0.1373,0.1528,0.1399,0.1349,0.1373,0.0929,0.1275,0.0948,0.1424,0.1070,0.1528,0.2436,0.2541,0.2364,0.2328,0.1449,0.1048,0.0985,0.0454,0.0263,0.0454,0.0443,0.0424,0.0870,0.1424,0.1449,0.2645,0.2680,0.3774,0.3392,0.3529,0.3460,0.3392,0.3426,0.3494,0.3182,0.3948,0.4119,0.3983,0.4330,0.4441,0.3704,0.2988,0.2918,0.2783,0.2034,0.1251,0.0719,0.0454,0.0364,0.0518,0.0909,0.0581,0.0568,0.0618,0.0389,0.0473,0.0543,0.0719,0.0494,0.0473,0.0473,0.0780,0.1007,0.0929,0.0618,0.0543,0.0555,0.0543,0.0929,0.1298,0.0870,0.0817,0.1476,0.1702,0.1583,0.1554,0.1449,0.1554,0.1702,0.2258,0.2164,0.2817,0.2951,0.3356,0.3599,0.3566,0.4801,0.5807,0.6183,0.5211,0.4051,0.4864,0.4864,0.4801,0.4801,0.4409,0.4476,0.3704,0.3529,0.2715,0.2715,0.3872,0.3426,0.3286,0.3286,0.3426,0.3321,0.3149,0.2436,0.2064,0.2609,0.2988,0.2680,0.2094,0.1969,0.1759,0.2164,0.2849,0.3667,0.3529,0.3872,0.4051,0.3983,0.3872,0.4017,0.3983,0.3740,0.4017,0.3356,0.4051,0.5342,0.5342,0.6183,0.5456,0.6043,0.6043,0.6427,0.5017,0.5176,0.4831,0.4186,0.3807,0.3599,0.3667,0.4220,0.4220,0.3704,0.3807,0.4652,0.5533,0.5665,0.5493,0.5707,0.4864,0.5707,0.5901,0.5992,0.5758,0.6227,0.6269,0.5620,0.6712,0.7547,0.7415,0.7036,0.7369,0.7331,0.8050,0.8050,0.7799,0.7799,0.7982,0.7718,0.7672,0.8375,0.8462,0.7881,0.7843,0.7799,0.8713,0.8623,0.8681,0.8
